title: Volatile Love
description: I want to be Rukaiya’s hero, but she’s made it clear she can take care of herself. Her fire burns me. Her fierce nature lures me in. She’s a wolf in sheep’s clothing, and I want her to devour me. She enjoys defying me and I love to taunt her.I always get the girl.Every. Single. Time.And this time is no different.He’s trying to be my knight in shining armor, but I don’t need him to be. That’s what I tell myself, anyway. Etienne doesn’t give up easily. He’s adamant to change my mind. Only, he doesn’t realize that being with me could get him killed.As I push, he pulls, and one of us is about to get wounded.Secrets. Desire. Violence.Our love is volatile.When secrets are spilled, nobody is safe.
author: Dani René
